Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a blue painted beard and parallel hands in relief holding a relief hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: fair - patches of glaze missing, foot damaged
